ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.vJpaResponse +{ "myElement": payload.myElement, "seqNo": payload.counter, "myId": payload.myId, "logType": payload."INVALID", "logErrorMessage":"ERD ELEMRNT IS NULL" }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.vJpaResponse +{ "myElement": payload.myElement, "seqNo": payload.counter, "myId": payload.myId, "logType": payload."INVALID", "logErrorMessage":"RECORDID IS NULL" }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.vJpaResponse +{ "myElement": payload.myElement, "seqNo": payload.counter, "myId": payload.myId, "logType": payload."INVALID", "logErrorMessage":"OLD VALUE IS NULL" }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.vJpaResponse +{ "myElement": payload.myElement, "seqNo": vars.counter, "myId": payload.myId, "logType": "success", "logErrorMessage":"Data inserted successfully " }
